description:
Today we`re having recess with the first graders...hey, Hitoha!
None of the kids are playing with me because you`re here!
Ah well, kids are pains in the neck anyways so it`s just as well.  I wish this class would just end already.
Hey, what`s wrong?  Your RC Helicopter`s stuck in a tree?
I suppose it`s up to me to come to the rescue then!
But you`ll have to be extra polite, call me "-sama" and be my footstool for a d-
What do you mean, "clam it?!"
Snotty little brat...
Source: crunchyroll
